# Health Data Grapher

Program to process CSV of Apple Health Data and import the records into InfluxDB suitable for creating personal dashboards.

## Contents

* `app.js`: Main program

## Prerequisites
* InfluxDB installed and accessible
* CSV files generated by https://github.com/freddiefujiwara/ahcd

## Dependencies
* Node modules
  * `minimist`: For parsing command line options
  * `debug`: For logging
  * `@fast-csv/parse`: For CSV parsing
  * `influx`: Interface with the InfluxDB

## Installation and Setup
* Install InfluxDB (localhost works fine): https://www.influxdata.com/products/influxdb-overview/
* ```sh
  git clone https://github.com/balain/healthDataGrapher
  npm install
	```
* Run `node app.js`

## Development setup

To turn on debug output, set the `DEBUG` environment variable, like so:

```sh
set DEBUG=*
```
